name: Wednesday Game
description:
A simple shoot-em-up game about a toad's life written with Monogame.

In this game you play as a humble Toad and you have to eat the bad flies and bugs, trying not to catch the good bees.

How to play:
  • Press LMB to eat a fly (green), RMB to eat a beetle (black).
  • Eating the right insect with a right mouse button gives you 1 point, wrong button - decreases your life by 1.
  • Eating bee reduces your health by 2 points
  • The game ends when you get 0 HP
EPILEPSY WARNING

THIS GAME CONTAINS FAST FLASHING IMAGES AND LOUD SOUNDS.  IT MAY CAUSE DISCOMFORT AND TRIGGER SEIZURES FOR PEOPLE WITH PHOTOSENSITIVE EPILEPSY.
